name: From Construction Dust to Copper Kettles
caption: A look back at the journey of building a brewery at 1,447 meters, from blasting to the logistical ballet of installing 3HL copper kettles in Andermatt.
imageAlt: Brewery team inspecting stainless steel tanks

name: What Alpine Water Gives to Our Beer
caption: Our secret *is* the Alpine water. Glacial runoff filtered through granite yields remarkably soft, pure water, giving us a blank canvas to build on.
imageAlt: Mountain stream flowing through alpine rocks

name: Cans, Bottles, and the Honest Choice
caption: Heavy glass feels premium, but cans win. They are better for the beer (blocking 100% of UV light), better for the planet (lighter, infinitely recyclable), and better for you (portable, safer).
imageAlt: Stacked aluminum beer cans in a brewery

name: A Brief History of Beer in Urserntal
caption: From the Gotthard pass to the beer cartel era, Andermatt has a dramatic history with brewing. Now, in 2025, Brauerei Andermatt is finally brewing at home.
imageAlt: Old black and white photo of a Swiss village
